title: Wasteland 2 (Latest With Patch 6) (GOG)
description:
Hey guys, here the latest version of Wasteland 2. This is the latest installer that contains patch 6. Will upload the mac and linux versions soon. Hope you guys enjoy and please help seed.


-------------------


Patch 6 Highlights


Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Added Steam Achievements for Mac OS X and Linux! Now, your friends, family, and vague acquaintances can all enjoy unlocking Achievements regardless of their choice in computer operating system.

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Fixed a bug in identifying the Broken Man during the Hollywood/Griffith questline that could in some cases render the peace outcome unattainable.

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Updated Prison HQ. A large rolling gate now blocks the Prison HQ to prevent quest sequence breaks. The gate is opened by Danforth at the appropriate time during the story, or when the player fixes the broken robot to destroy the turrets and gate. 

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Huge bug fix pass - nearly our biggest patch ever!?

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Large English text updates.

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Localization fixes and updates across all languages.


-------------------------


Wasteland 2 is the direct sequel to 1988Ã¢â‚¬â„¢s Wasteland, the first-ever post-apocalyptic computer RPG and the inspiration behind the Fallout series. Until Wasteland, no other CRPG had ever allowed players to control and command individual party members for tactical purposes or given them the chance to make moral choices that would directly affect the world around them. Wasteland was a pioneer in multi-path problem solving, dripping in choice and consequence and eschewing the typical one-key-per-lock puzzle solving methods of its peers, in favor of putting the power into playersÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ hands to advance based on their own particular play style.

The Wasteland series' impressive and innovative lineage has been preserved at its very core, but modernized for the fans of today with Wasteland 2. Immerse yourself in turn-based tactical combat that will test the very limits of your strategy skills as you fight to survive a desolate world where brute strength alone isnÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t enough to save you. Deck out your Ranger squad with the most devastating weaponry this side of the fallout zone and get ready for maximum destruction with the RPG-style character advancement and customization that made the first Wasteland so brutal. Save an ally from certain death or let them perish Ã¢â‚¬â€œ the choice is yours, but so are the consequences.

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢One Size Does Not Fit All: Don't feel like finding the key for a door? Why not try 
a Rocket Launcher! Basically the same thing... right?

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Enhanced Classic RPG Game Play: Classic RPG game play ideas updated with modern design philosophies.

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Decision Making... with Consequences: With both short and long term reactivity to the players choices, every decision matters in the outcome of the story.

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Huge & Customizable: Dozens of hours of game. Hundreds of characters. Thousands of variations on your Rangers' appearance. Over 150 weapons. Dozens of skills. Even the UI can be customized.
